item.title: Qt Deploy And Compress
item.description: windeployqt This tool will help deploy qt problem. usage: windeployqt <execute file name> and using enigma Virtual box to package files to one file. If deploy as a folder upx can be used to shrink the size. enigma Virtual box upx
